Description: Flower is the main reproductive part of the plant It is made up of four whorls and out of them two outer whorls are calyx and corolla
Tips for plant care: Clean your vase,Change the water regularly

Description: Mosses are non-flowering plants which produce spores and have stems and leaves,but don't have true roots.
Tips for plant care: Avoid placing them in direct sunlight,Use a spray bottle to gently mist the moss

Description: Herbs are small plants that have a fleshy or juicy stem when they are young.The stems develop hard,when they grow old.
Tips for plant care: Place them in a sunny spot,Water them regularly

Description: Shrubs are any sort of woody thick plants that branch into a few stems or trunks at the base and is littler than a tree
Tips for plant care: Choose a suitable location for sunlight,Water your shrub regularly

Description: Cacti are desert plants.They grow in dry places where other plants have trouble living.They are also protected by sharp spines
Tips for plant care: Place them in a sunny spot,Water them sparingly

Description: The orchid is among one of the largest families of flowering plants.These type of flowers can grow in all terrestrial ecosystems.
Tips for plant care: Place them with filtered sunlight,Water them regularly

Description: Bamboos are typically fast-growing perennials,with some species growing as much as 30 cm per day.
Tips for plant care: Avoid exposing them to extreme temperature,Water them regularly
